4033.verse: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ|Did we take them|136|145|14894$سِخْرِيًّا|(in) ridicule|94|112|12385$أَمْ|or|38|56|62$زَاغَتْ|has turned away|131|149|14895$عَنْهُمُ|from them|87|105|826$ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ|the vision?`|99|108|5909$

4034.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|92|58$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|107|28$لَحَقٌّ|(is) surely (the) truth -|175|218|8188$تَخَاصُمُ|(the) quarreling|123|166|14896$أَهْلِ|(of the) people|120|142|2993$ٱلنَّارِ|(of) the Fire.|106|106|410$

4036.verse: رَبُّ|Lord|59|80|6232$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|173|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|152|352$وَمَا|and whatever|111|152|46$بَيْنَهُمَا|(is) between them,|147|168|3978$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|the All-Mighty,|118|327|1187$ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ|the Oft-Forgiving.|139|348|14897$

4042.verse: فَإِذَا|So when|77|92|1730$سَوَّيْتُهُۥ|I have proportioned him|177|208|9760$وَنَفَخْتُ|and breathed|108|139|9761$فِيهِ|into him|72|103|32$مِن|of|50|81|53$رُّوحِى|My spirit,|86|102|9762$فَقَعُواْ|then fall down|114|213|9763$لَهُۥ|to him|61|258|977$سَـٰجِدِينَ|prostrating.`|105|204|6703$

4045.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|90|309$يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ|`O Iblis!|91|126|9766$مَا|What|55|90|262$مَنَعَكَ|prevented you|116|151|6266$أَن|that|48|83|655$تَسْجُدَ|you (should) prostrate|169|186|6267$لِمَا|to (one) whom|118|127|426$خَلَقْتُ|I created|81|100|14901$بِيَدَىَّ‌ۖ|with My Hands?|124|143|14902$أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ|Are you arrogant|132|151|14903$أَمْ|or|38|57|62$كُنتَ|are you|70|89|1281$مِنَ|of|50|59|156$ٱلْعَالِينَ|the exalted ones.`|144|144|14904$

4047.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|96|309$فَٱخْرُجْ|`Then get out|115|162|6274$مِنْهَا|of it,|58|104|246$فَإِنَّكَ|for indeed, you|120|166|5398$رَجِيمٌ|(are) accursed.|123|146|9770$

4049.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|107|309$رَبِّ|`My Lord!|85|153|7$فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ|Then give me respite|159|227|9772$إِلَىٰ|until|53|121|118$يَوْمِ|(the) Day|84|118|10$يُبْعَثُونَ|they are resurrected.`|170|170|6277$

4050.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|112|309$فَإِنَّكَ|`Then indeed, you|143|222|5398$مِنَ|(are) of|71|150|156$ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ|those given respite,|152|191|6278$

4052.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|100|309$فَبِعِزَّتِكَ|`Then by Your might|158|213|14906$لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ|I will surely mislead them|185|240|14907$أَجْمَعِينَ|all.|95|122|1408$

4032.verse: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?

4033.verse: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"

4034.verse: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.

4035.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing.

4036.verse: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."

4039.verse: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].

4040.verse: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."

4041.verse: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.

4042.verse: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."

4043.verse: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.

4044.verse: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.

4045.verse: [Allah] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty?"

4046.verse: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."

4047.verse: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled.

4048.verse: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."

4049.verse: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

4050.verse: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

4051.verse: Until the Day of the time well-known."

4052.verse: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all

4053.verse: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
